did.unittitle: J. Walter Thompson Company. Competitive Advertisements, Pre-55 Group, 1894-1957
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Founded in 1864, the J. Walter Thompson Company (JWT) is one of the oldest and largest enduring advertising agencies in the United States. The collection spans the years 1894-1957 and includes newspaper and magazine print advertisements for companies which were competitors of JWT clients. Product categories include automobiles and transportation; bakeries and baked goods; beverages including alcoholic, carbonated, bottled water, coffee and soft drinks; cleaning products; cosmetics, shaving preparations and other toiletries; dairy products; food including pet foods; gasoline, oil and other petroleum products; newspapers and magazines; over-the-counter pharmaceuticals; and tobacco products including cigars, cigarettes and pipe tobacco. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Some materials are fragile and may require further processing prior to access. Contact Research Services staff for further information.
Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], J. Walter Thompson Company. Competitive Advertisements, Pre-55 Group, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The J. Walter Thompson Company. Competitive Advertisements, Pre-55 Group were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 1987.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection is minimally processed: materials may not have been ordered and described beyond their original condition.
